p:
In Justice Court before J.W. Still Justice of the Peace in and for Spokane County Washington Territory Washington Territory-Plaintiff D. Aimesworth-Defendant Territory of Washington County of Spokane> ss M.H. Whitney being first duly sworn deposes and sayd that at Cheney in Spokane County aforesaid one D. Aimesworth did on the 6th day of September A.D. 1884 unlawfully, to do with the intent to defraud deceive and comment to his own was the sum of Eight hundred and twenty eight 828 Dollars ful money of the United States which said money was intended to his care and keeping by one M.H. Whitney of said County and territory that the said D. Aimesworth fraudulently cconverted the said money to his own use and has presently denied and refused to account for the said money to the said person who intrusted it to his care as her agent for the safe keeping of said money That the said D. Aimesworth did on the 6th day of September A.D. 1884. Convert the amount is larceny as appears by the facts therein before stated contrary to statutes in such cases made and provided and against the peace and dignity of the people of the Territory of Washington and affront that defendant be arrested and dealt with according to law M.H. Whitney
Subscribed and dated before me this 24th day of September A.D. 1884 Jud W. Still Justice of the Peace Spokane County W.T.
